description: I'm a Canadian expat living in California, eh.
flickrDescription: My photo albums from various adventures, usually decent quality
instagramDescription: Random snaps from my daily life. Probably boring, but maybe not!
facebookDescription: Good way to keep in touch if you've ever met me in person
twitterDescription: I mostly tweet about random shit and beers that I drink
careerDescription: I'm passionate about all things JavaScript, interface development and user experience. Coming from a rather diverse background however, I tend to be well-rounded and have a reputation for getting shit done.
adventureDescription: My favourite outdoor activities are rock climbing, hiking, camping and archery. I've been riding motorcycles for over 5 years and recently got into off-roading in my Jeep Wrangler. I like to travel and explore new places.
gamingDescription: Everyone has something that pulls them away from the noise of life, for me it's video games. Diablo 2 and Dark Souls are my favorites, evidenced by having them inked, closely followed by Overwatch and the Warcraft franchise.
